trade_signal_metadata.name: Keltner Channel Momentum Breakout Strategy
trade_signal_metadata.desc: The 'Keltner Channel Momentum Breakout Strategy' utilizes Keltner Channels to identify potential breakout opportunities by assessing swing momentum in asset price movements. By combining the volatility metrics of the channels with a momentum oscillator, this strategy seeks to maximize profits from significant price swings. Ideal for traders looking to capitalize on volatile market conditions.
